pageContext.claim: “There are many criminals being apprehended, but vast numbers are coming because our economy is so strong. We have the strongest economy now in the entire world.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump exaggerates the situation at the southern border, where thousands of Central American families, including many women and children, are showing up to seek entry or asylum. Although economic factors are a consideration, in many cases these migrants are fleeing violence and unsafe conditions in their home countries.
